post.author: 황성규
post.content: From Toronto to Picton How to get there From Toronto: Highway 401 East to Wooler Road - Exit 522. South to 33, South/East to Wellington, to Bloomfield. From Montreal: Highway 401 West to Marysville - Exit 566. South/West on highway 49 to Picton. West on 33 to Bloomfield. From Belleville: South on highway 62 to Bloomfield. When you're in Bloomfield Coming from Toronto and Belleville: From the intersection of highways 33 and 62 (at Beckers), continue east on 33 for a quarter of a kilometer. Turn right at signs for Sandbanks and Westlake onto Highway 12. Proceed 5 km's to Hideaway Trailer Park on your right. Green and white address locator # 1024. Coming from Montreal: Continue through Bloomfield until you reach Beckers. Do a U-turn and follow the above directions. TRAVEL TIME FROM THE 401 ~ ABOUT 35 MINUTES
post.title: 찾아오시는방법 / 지도
